description: InCommand 1200 slow boot time exceeding 3 minutes
recommended_action: Check for SD card corruption - update firmware - clear old field data to free storage
Recalibrate touchscreen from settings menu - if persistent replace touch digitizer

description: GPS 7500 RTK float instead of fix in open field
recommended_action: Verify base station link - check radio frequency and power - inspect antenna cable

description: GPS 6500 guidance line drifting through the day
recommended_action: Normal for SBAS correction level - upgrade to RTK for repeatability - re-set A-B line

description: SteerCommand overshooting line in headland turns
recommended_action: Reduce steering aggressiveness - check hydraulic oil level and condition - recalibrate

description: OnTrac3 motor humming but not steering
recommended_action: Check motor engagement clutch - verify steering calibration - inspect column adapter torque

description: DirectCommand not communicating with ISOBUS planter
recommended_action: Check ISOBUS cable - verify implement TC number - update DirectCommand firmware

description: SurePoint sections not shutting off at boundaries
recommended_action: Verify field boundary accuracy - check section valve wiring - update overlap settings

description: OptRx sensor readings erratic in low canopy
recommended_action: Verify sensor height (30-36 inches) - clean lens - check for condensation - recalibrate

description: SMS software crashing when loading large yield files
recommended_action: Update to latest version - increase PC RAM - split large files into smaller field boundaries

description: AgFiniti sync timeout - data stuck on display
recommended_action: Check WiFi signal strength - verify account credentials - force sync from display menu

description: Yield monitor showing inconsistent bushels per acre
recommended_action: Recalibrate with weigh wagon - check mass-flow sensor for buildup - verify moisture sensor

description: SeedCommand electric drive motor overheating at high population
recommended_action: Check motor ventilation - verify population within motor RPM limits - inspect wiring for chafe

description: Hydraulic Down Force not holding pressure on rough ground
recommended_action: Check hydraulic hose connections - verify accumulator charge - inspect row unit pivot

description: CAN bus communication dropout between display and receiver
recommended_action: Inspect CAN cable at T-connectors - verify termination resistors - check for EMI near cables
